[[inst_bstart_call]]
==== BSTART CALL

*Syntax:* BSTART.CALL, <br_label>, <rt_label>, -> ra

*Description:* Block Start with CALL: marks entry point for a function/block that may be called.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_bstart_call.svg[BSTART CALL encoding,width=800]

*Group:* BBD/BSTART
